thread.title: ‘Repent and believe in the gospel’: Giant Bible greets attendees at the #GoldenGlobes
thread.title_full: ‘Repent and believe in the gospel’: Giant Bible greets attendees at the #GoldenGlobes

author: Greg P.
title: ‘Repent and believe in the gospel’: Giant Bible greets attendees at the #GoldenGlobes
text:
‘Repent and believe in the gospel’: Giant Bible greets attendees at the #GoldenGlobes Posted at 8:09 pm on January 8, 2017 by Greg P. 
A giant Bible was spotted next to the security line at tonight’s Golden Globes with the message of “Repent and believe in the gospel.” Check it out: The #GoldenGlobes security line has its own giant bible! #glam pic.twitter.com/v7O5d3eOi8 
— Ariane Lange (@arianelange) January 8, 2017 Giant bible on our way into car security #GoldenGlobes pic.twitter.com/F6KoQRIjee 
— Sandy Cohen (@APSandy) January 8, 2017 
And because there was a giant limousine traffic jam at the checkpoint, people were forced to contemplate Jesus for quite a long time: Just your Classic limo jam and massive over sized bible picture #GoldenGlobes pic.twitter.com/oYZLeosifi 
— Daniel Pemberton (@DANIELPEMBERTON) January 8, 2017 
Do you think Hollywood will get the message? Trending
